description: Born in the Philippines (thanks US Air Force), raised in the south. Blessed to be going to the best engineering school and looking forward to a potential career in medicine. Started following Jesus in 2010 and life has never been fuller.
aspects: Being grown, encouraged, and challenged by an excellent, diverse brotherhood to do life with. Lambda Chi Alpha serves to be many different niches for many different people. Weekends away are always a great time, be it semi-formal, formal, road trips, brotherhood retreat or otherwise.
quotes: "Love is an act of endless forgiveness." - Jean Vanier
name: Clark Howell
